A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have a new reverence for episode 1 now. As goofy as it was at least there was character development and story building. With this movie\, for the most part\, it’s just too similar too episode 5 in a lot of the story and dialogue. It also tries to be too funny and bounces around way too much and has storylines that are unnecessary or make no sense.
